extendedInfo.description: Pocket Budget Free (Exactly same as Pocket Budget with the annoying ad on the top, required click to hide the binner)DescriptionUse Pocket Budget to manage your financial life better!Do you want to know what your spending pattern at a glance is?  Do you want to make your spending under the controlled budget? Do you want to watch your spending and balance all the time through your phone without checking bank accounts or wallet?  You can easily do all of them by just using Pocket Budget.  FeaturesVarious but easy input methods: Pocket Budget provides its own embedded input methods â âdrag and dropâ touch for editing, its own number pad, voice recognition and the scrolling pane style number and date input. Display at a glance: Up-to-date balance and budget status, todayâs spending items list and the shopping list are displayed each on the screen and you can jump around among them by simple fling action.One click menu bar:  The side menu bar provides one-click access to all menus throughout Pocket Budget application. Easy set-up :  You can set up initial balances of cash, debit and credit card and the budget for monthly, weekly and daily. Cash, Debit card, Credit card Categories: Pocket Budget provides these three categories so you can differentiate the source of spending and income.  Shopping List:  It is created with shopping items which are able to include each price as well. When spending is done based on the chosen shopping list, itâs automatically become a spending item. Therefore, you can simply manage the shopping plan and spending without extra work.Graphical Report: With the function that Pocket Budget provides monthly based summary of the chosen month, itâs also represented to the bar-chart style report. Additionally, the pie-chart report shows spending by categories of the chosen month.Multi- languages support: Currently, Pocket Budget supports English, Chinese and Korean languages and a couple of different currencies format.Are you ready? Get Pocket Budget Free now!

reviews.comment: Terrible, i can\'t add a budget and it keeps asking me \"complete your transaction\" i made one and it dosen\'t work. Monthly Budget was greater
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Cumbersome to use, ads on top block some buttons.  Poorly designed, numerous windows, just overly complicated in usage.  Uninstalled quickly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Terrible design. It really sucks. The ads cover the most important features, its really user Unfriendly. Wouldn\'t recommend it for anyone. And I can\'t even find the full version.
